alert.note: Alert for Coastal Chatham; Effingham; Inland Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 8:20PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EFFINGHAM, CHATHAM, BEAUFORT, HAMPTON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 820 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Shawnee to near Purysburgh to near Bellinger Hill Area, and moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Hilton Head Island, Bluffton, Beaufort, Port Royal, Ridgeland, Springfield, Hampton and Yemassee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
